snippet: After varying periods without new albums, Christina Aguilera, Soundgarden and Brian Eno offer new releases.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews Lotus, latest album by Christina Aguilera; Jon Pareles reviews Soundgarden's new record King Animal; Ben Ratliff reviews Brian Eno's album Lux.

byline.original: By JON CARAMANICA, JON PARELES and BEN RATLIFF

lead_paragraph: After varying periods without new albums, Christina Aguilera, Soundgarden and Brian Eno offer new releases.

headline.seo: Albums by Christina Aguilera, Soundgarden and Brian Eno
headline.main: Albums by Christina Aguilera, Soundgarden and Brian Eno
